title: User login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid username/email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Check that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is shown when entering invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is rejected and proper error message is displayed.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access routes and features permitted by their assigned roles.

steps.description: Login with a user account assigned a specific role.
Attempt to access various routes and UI features.
Verify access is granted or denied correctly according to role permissions.

title: Agency owner creates agency profile and invites team members
description: Verify that an agency owner can create a new agency profile and send team invitations with unique token links that enforce roles.

steps.description: Login as an agency owner.
Create a new agency profile.
Invite team members via generated token invitation links assigning specific roles.
Verify that team members receive unique token links and can join with assigned roles enforced.

title: Dashboard displays accurate and updated KPIs
description: Verify that the dashboard metrics and data visualizations reflect accurate and timely backend data.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard.
Check that performance metrics and visualizations display correct data based on the current backend state.

title: Kanban pipeline drag-and-drop functionality
description: Verify that leads can be moved across pipeline stages using drag-and-drop and the updated state persists correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the sales pipeline Kanban page.
Drag a lead card from one pipeline stage to another.
Confirm the lead is visually moved to the new stage and the change persists after page refresh.

title: Interactive quiz creation, running, and response saving
description: Verify marketing users can build quizzes, distribute them publicly, and that responses are captured and retrievable for analysis.

steps.description: Login as marketing user and navigate to quiz builder.
Create a new interactive quiz with various question types.
Publish the quiz and access the public quiz runner page.
Submit quiz responses as a public user.
Go back to the quiz responses analysis page.
Verify that submitted quiz responses are saved accurately and displayed in the analysis interface.

title: Contact and contract management functionality
description: Verify that users can create, edit, view, and delete contacts and contracts while respecting role permissions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to contacts and contracts modules.
Create new contacts and contracts using modal dialogs.
Edit existing contacts and contracts.
Delete contacts and contracts if permitted.
Confirm that all operations persist correctly and respect the current user's role permissions.

title: Subscription plan upgrade and Stripe billing integration
description: Verify that agency owners can upgrade or change subscription plans and that Stripe billing processes payments correctly, updating UI and billing status.

steps.description: Login as agency owner and navigate to the subscription plans page.
Select and confirm an upgrade or plan change.
Verify that payment is processed successfully via Stripe and the UI updates to reflect new plan limits and billing status.

title: Agency invite token uniqueness and membership enforcement
description: Verify that each invite token sent to new members is unique, that tokens can only be used once, and that membership roles are enforced upon acceptance.

steps.description: Generate multiple invite tokens for team members.
Verify each token is unique and can be used only once.
Accept an invitation using a token and check assigned role enforcement.

title: UI compliance with retro pixel art design and responsiveness
description: Verify that the entire user interface matches the retro pixel art design specifications and is responsive across multiple device sizes.

steps.description: Navigate through all major UI screens including landing page, dashboard, pipeline, quizzes, contacts, contracts, and plans pages.
Check that visual elements conform to pixel art style, color scheme, font usage and design specs.
Resize browser/window to different viewport sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Verify layouts adapt correctly and remain usable on all device sizes.

title: Authentication required enforcement on protected routes
description: Verify that users not logged in are redirected to the login page when trying to access protected routes.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected pages like dashboard, pipeline, agency profile, and billing plans without authentication.
Check redirection to login page and that no protected data is exposed.

title: Persistence of sales pipeline state after browser refresh
description: Verify that pipeline state after drag-and-drop actions persists after a browser or page refresh.

steps.description: Rearrange leads within the sales pipeline by drag-and-drop.
Refresh the browser page.
Confirm that the lead positions and stages remain as arranged before refresh.

title: Quiz response data accuracy under edge cases
description: Verify that quiz responses are captured correctly including edge cases like empty answers, multiple selections, and invalid inputs.

steps.description: Create and publish a quiz with questions supporting multiple choice and optional answers.
Submit responses including skipping some questions, selecting multiple choices, and providing invalid data if allowed.
Verify that all responses are saved accurately, with proper handling or validation of edge cases.

title: Team member role modification and permissions update
description: Verify that agency owners can modify team members' roles and that permissions update accordingly in real-time.

steps.description: Login as agency owner and navigate to team management.
Change a team member's role.
Verify that the team member's permissions are updated accordingly and enforced immediately.
